sentence.Network_en: He looked all right, but when he began to talk, we saw that he was as nutty as a fruitcake.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看来没什么, 但当他一开口说话, 我们就看得出他已疯得很厉害了.

sentence.Network_en: Favorite desserts include mince pie or pumpkin pie, plum pudding and fruitcake.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们最喜欢的饭后甜点包括甜馅饼或南瓜馅饼 、 李子布丁和水果蛋糕.

entry.def: A fruitcake is a cake that contains raisins, currants, and other dried fruit.
If you refer to someone as a fruitcake, you mean that they are mad or that their behaviour is very strange.

means.word_mean: 2. a rich cake containing dried fruit and nuts and citrus peel and so on
